sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The affliction and deliverance of the saints or, The whole booke of Iob composed into English heroicall verse metaphrastically. / By Thomas Manley Iun. Esq; Manley, Thomas, 1628-1690. Cross, Thomas, fl. 1632-1682, engraver.
[10], 100 p., plate : port.
Printed by W.H. for Iohn Tey, at the White-Lion in the Strande near the New Exchange, London : 1652.
In verse. Portrait of the author signed: T. Cross: sculpsit. Annotation on Thomason copy: "October 17. 1651 ("1651" is crossed out); the 2 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[10], 100 p., plate : port.
Printed by W.H. for Iohn Tey, at the White-Lion in the Strande near the New Exchange, London : 1652.
In verse. Portrait of the author signed: T. Cross: sculpsit. Annotation on Thomason copy: "October 17. 1651 ("1651" is crossed out); the 2 in the imprint date has been crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Iohn Tey
